DF-TestWrite.description: Test environment write access - can query, C-STORE and C-MOVE to test PACS

DF-TestRead.description: Test environment read access - can view status and query test PACS

DF-ProdWrite.description: Production environment write access - can query, C-STORE and C-MOVE to production PACS

DF-ProdRead.description: Production environment read access - can view status and query production PACS
